lines.text:
[as Carmelengo is lowering the triple crown onto his head]
You've got the wrong guy!
I want him to know it was me who killed him. I don't want him to die thinking it was just... bad luck.
You're fired! Defrocked, call it what you like. You're Out!
Do you know who I am? I'm Cardinal Rocco, you're lucky you're being fed here!

Naturally the first thing I want to know is, why our trusted silver haired friend Father Albini is not at this moment cultivating our long term business relationship. BY RESTING HIS ASS ON THE VATICAN THRONE.
